Class ButtonReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team3997.robot.hardware.ButtonReader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ToggleButtonReader

    public class ButtonReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Debounces and reads controller values
    Author:
    Peter I. Chacko, Eric Warner, John Sullivan Jr, Jake Boothby, Elliot Friedlander
